Value.English: Returns a Cluster with the specified AirAmmoNativeType and RecommendedBombingDirection. The returned Cluster has no StrikePoints.
Returns a Null Cluster, which is a Cluster that does not exist. Used for designating a "missing" Cluster value.
Returns "true" if the specified Cluster parameter equals NullCluster.
Returns a user-oriented description of the specified Cluster.
The number of StrikePoints in the specified Cluster's StrikePoints collection.
The Native Type of the AirAmmo (sub-type of TAH_AIR) defined by the specified Cluster, to be dropped on all Strike Points.
The Recommended Bombing Direction of the specified Cluster (Null Azimuth if not defined).
Returns the average of Aim Points (see StrikePointAimPoint Function) of all Strike Points of the specified Cluster. If the specified Cluster has no Strike Points - a Null Point is returned.

Returns a particular Strike Point in the specified Cluster's Strike Points collection, that is associated with the specified StrikePointIndex (1-based). If the specified StrikePointIndex is greater than the number of Strike Points in the specified Cluster's Strike Points collection - an Exception is thrown.
Returns a Cluster that is a copy of the specified Cluster parameter, with the specified StrikePoint added at the end.

Reurns the C4I ID of the Activity entity (elementary work defining component of a Mission Order) from which the specified StrikePoint has originated. If the specified StrikePoint has not originated from a C4I Activity - a Null String is returned.
Strike Point Fully Qualified Aim Point ID

Returns the fully qualified C4I ID of the C4I Aim Point entity with which the specified Strike Point is associated. The returned string contains the C4I IDs of - The containing Target C4I entity. - The containing Component C4I entity, within the Target. - The Aim Point within the Component. if the specified Strike Point is not associated with a C4I Aim Point entity - a Null Integer is returned.
Returns the Aim Point of the specified Strike Point.
Returns the Aim Point Height (in meters above ground) of the specified Strike Point.
Returns the Component Native Type of the specified Strike Point.
Returns the Airforce Essence Name of the specified Strike Point.
Returns the Forced Outcome of the specified Strike Point.
Returns the Target Name of the specified Strike Point.
Returns the Component Name of the specified Strike Point.
Returns the Aim Point Name of the specified Strike Point.
Returns the Corrected Aim Point of the specified Strike Point. Note: Corrected Aim Point is initialized by default to NullPoint. It may be set by StrikePointAdjusted Atomic Function.
Returns the Selected Content Component of the specified Strike Point. Note: Selected Content Component is initialized by default to NullUnit. It may be set by StrikePointAdjusted Atomic Function.

Returns a Strike Point that is a copy of the specified StrikePoint with: - Corrected Aim Point set to the specified CorrectedAimPoint value. - Selected Content Component is set to the specified SelectedContentComponent.
Returns a Null Strike Point, which is a Strike Point that does not exist. Used for designating a "missing" Strike Point value.
Returns "true" if the specified Strike Point parameter equals NullStrikePoint.
